body:
Herman-Miller has a lot of classic furniture as nice 3D models available 
on their website in 3DS, DWG, and DXF.


http://www.hermanmiller.com/CDA/SSA/Category/0,1564,a4-c410,00.html


Go to the 'category' pull-down menu for more. Here's a lot of Eames and 
Nelson stuff:
http://www.hermanmiller.com/CDA/SSA/3D/0,1646,a4-c410-pc41,00.html


I use these a lot to dress up office lobbies and the like.


Jeffrey
